title: 關聖帝君一百籤第一百籤
subtitle: 唐明宗禱告天癸癸

analysis.zh: 這首詩的主題是天賦與信念：作者自稱為天仙雷雨師，擁有預知吉凶的能力；祈禱者只要誠心祈求，便能得到靈應；最後一支籤象徵終極的祝福，預示一切事宜皆順遂。
analysis.en: The theme of this poem is the divine gift of insight and the power of sincere faith: the speaker presents himself as a heavenly thunder master who can foresee fortune and misfortune; by praying with genuine devotion, one will receive spiritual responses; the final lot, being the hundredth, symbolizes the ultimate blessing and promises that all matters will go smoothly.
analysis.jp: この詩のテーマは、天賦の知恵と真摯な信念の力です。作者は天仙雷雨師として自己を紹介し、吉凶を先見できると語ります。誠心で祈れば霊的な応答が得られ、最後の一筆である百番の籤は究極の祝福を象徴し、すべての事が円満に進むことを示唆しています。
analysis.reference: 唐明宗。沙陀國人後。五代。唐。李克用之養子。登極之時。年踰六十。每夕在於宮中。焚香祝天曰。某本胡人。因亂為眾所推。願天早生聖人。為生民主事。見十國世家。

rag_analysis:
According to the poem, the core meaning is:
- The speaker claims divine status as a thunder deity, implying authority over destiny.
- He declares the ability to foresee good and bad, positioning himself as a conduit between gods and humans.
- Emphasis on sincere prayer as the means to receive spiritual response.
- The hundredth lot is highlighted as the final one, symbolizing completion and ultimate good fortune.
- The poem conveys assurance that all endeavors will succeed, reflecting a hopeful, auspicious tone.
